column14: BB it is simply ridiculous that BB is priced at 870 today let alone under 10 With all of the progress are Corp Dev Cylance purchase for 13 to 12 of IPO price and alliances tons of QNX deals and development of the integrated solutions Jarvis Spark etc and validation of the IP portfolio increase in licensing in FY19 with much much more to come we sit here under 10 Mind boggling Either hatred for Canada or legacy BB true many lost much in the smartphone debacle someone has vendetta against BB Big boys holding down
